dishes.name: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
dishes.instructions: Toast the bread until crisp. Mash the avocado with lemon juice and salt, then spread onto the toast. Poach an egg and place it on top of the avocado toast. Drizzle with olive oil and a pinch of pepper.

dishes.name: Classic Guacamole
dishes.instructions: Mash peeled avocados in a bowl. Stir in lime juice, finely chopped red onion and cilantro. Season with salt and serve with tortilla chips.

dishes.name: Orange Glazed Chicken
dishes.instructions: Combine orange juice, soy sauce, honey and minced garlic in a saucepan and simmer until slightly thickened. Sear the chicken breasts in a skillet, then brush with the glaze and bake until cooked through.

dishes.name: Orange Almond Cake
dishes.instructions: Simmer whole oranges until soft, then purée. Mix with almond flour, eggs, sugar and melted butter to make a batter. Bake until golden and set.

dishes.name: Strawberry Shortcake
dishes.instructions: Slice strawberries and sprinkle with sugar. Layer on split shortcake biscuits with whipped cream.

dishes.name: Strawberry Spinach Salad
dishes.instructions: Toss spinach with sliced strawberries, crumbled goat cheese, candied pecans and balsamic vinaigrette.

dishes.name: Lemon Tart
dishes.instructions: Blind‑bake the pastry crust until lightly golden. Whisk lemon juice, sugar, eggs and melted butter together, pour into the crust and bake until the filling is set.

dishes.name: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
dishes.instructions: Sauté minced garlic in butter until fragrant. Add the shrimp and cook until pink. Add lemon juice and zest, toss and cook for another minute.

dishes.name: Roasted Grape Crostini
dishes.instructions: Toss grapes with olive oil and rosemary; roast until burst and caramelized. Spread goat cheese on toasted baguette slices and top with roasted grapes.

dishes.name: Grape Walnut Salad
dishes.instructions: Halve grapes and toast the walnuts. Toss with mixed greens, crumble feta over the salad and drizzle with balsamic vinaigrette.

dishes.name: Roasted Broccoli with Garlic
dishes.instructions: Toss broccoli florets with olive oil and minced garlic, roast until tender and drizzle with lemon juice.

dishes.name: Broccoli Cheese Soup
dishes.instructions: Cook chopped broccoli and onion in broth until tender. Stir in milk and cheddar cheese and blend until smooth.

dishes.name: Roasted Asparagus
dishes.instructions: Toss asparagus with olive oil, salt and pepper. Roast on a sheet tray until tender.

dishes.name: Asparagus Risotto
dishes.instructions: Sauté chopped asparagus, then add arborio rice and white wine. Gradually stir in broth until creamy; finish with parmesan cheese.

dishes.name: Stuffed Artichokes
dishes.instructions: Remove the choke from each artichoke and stuff with a mixture of breadcrumbs, parmesan and minced garlic. Drizzle with olive oil and bake until tender.

dishes.name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
dishes.instructions: Combine chopped artichokes and spinach with cream cheese, garlic and mozzarella. Bake until hot and bubbly.

dishes.name: Kale Caesar Salad
dishes.instructions: Massage kale leaves with caesar dressing, then toss with croutons and grated parmesan cheese.

dishes.name: Crispy Kale Chips
dishes.instructions: Toss kale leaves with olive oil and sea salt, spread on a baking sheet and bake until crisp.

dishes.name: Zucchini Bread
dishes.instructions: Mix grated zucchini with flour, sugar, eggs and cinnamon to form a batter. Bake in a loaf pan until a toothpick comes out clean.

dishes.name: Stuffed Zucchini Boats
dishes.instructions: Halve zucchinis lengthwise, scoop out the centers and fill with a mixture of cooked ground meat and tomato sauce. Top with mozzarella and bake until tender.

dishes.name: Cantaloupe Sorbet
dishes.instructions: Purée ripe cantaloupe with sugar and lemon juice in a blender. Freeze in an ice cream maker according to manufacturer’s instructions.

dishes.name: Cantaloupe Prosciutto Skewers
dishes.instructions: Cube the cantaloupe and thread onto skewers with pieces of prosciutto and fresh basil leaves. Drizzle with balsamic reduction before serving.

dishes.name: Watermelon Feta Salad
dishes.instructions: Cube the watermelon and crumble the feta cheese. Toss with chopped mint, drizzle with olive oil and lime juice.

dishes.name: Watermelon Popsicles
dishes.instructions: Blend watermelon with lime juice and sugar. Pour into popsicle molds and freeze until solid.

dishes.name: Peach Cobbler
dishes.instructions: Arrange sliced peaches in a baking dish. Combine sugar, flour and baking powder, mix with melted butter to form a batter. Spoon over peaches and bake until golden brown.

dishes.name: Grilled Peach Salad
dishes.instructions: Halve peaches and grill until marks appear. Toss arugula with goat cheese and toasted pecans; top with warm grilled peaches and drizzle with honey.

dishes.name: Roasted Apple
dishes.instructions: Toss the apple with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Roast until tender.

dishes.name: Apple Salad
dishes.instructions: Combine sliced apple with mixed greens. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.

dishes.name: Grape Walnut Salad

dishes.name: Mexican Street Corn
dishes.instructions: Grill the corn until charred. Slather with mayonnaise, sprinkle with cotija cheese and chili powder, and squeeze fresh lime over the top.

dishes.name: Corn Chowder
dishes.instructions: Cook diced bacon until crisp, then sauté onion and potatoes in the drippings. Add corn kernels and milk, simmer until potatoes are tender.

dishes.name: Caprese Salad
dishes.instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Arrange with basil leaves, drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.

dishes.name: Heirloom Tomato Tart
dishes.instructions: Spread goat cheese on a sheet of puff pastry, top with sliced tomatoes and thyme, drizzle with olive oil, and bake until the pastry is golden.

dishes.name: Stuffed Chili Peppers
dishes.instructions: Sauté onion and cooked rice, mix with cheese. Stuff the peppers with the mixture and bake in tomato sauce until tender.

dishes.name: Chili Pepper Relish
dishes.instructions: Finely chop the peppers and cook with vinegar, sugar and garlic until thickened to make a spicy relish.

dishes.name: Butternut Squash Soup
dishes.instructions: Sauté chopped squash and onion, then simmer in broth until soft. Purée and stir in a splash of cream.

dishes.name: Roasted Squash with Sage
dishes.instructions: Cut squash into cubes, toss with olive oil and sage leaves, and roast until tender.

dishes.name: Chicken Lettuce Wraps
dishes.instructions: Cook ground chicken with ginger and soy sauce. Spoon into crisp lettuce leaves and drizzle with sesame oil.

dishes.instructions: Combine pitted cherries with sugar and cornstarch. Pour into a pie crust, top with another crust and bake until bubbly.

dishes.name: Watermelon Popsicles
dishes.instructions: Blend watermelon with lime juice and sugar. Pour into popsicle molds and freeze until solid.

dishes.name: Strawberry Shortcake
dishes.instructions: Slice strawberries and sprinkle with sugar. Layer on split shortcake biscuits with whipped cream.

dishes.name: Strawberry Spinach Salad
dishes.instructions: Toss spinach with sliced strawberries, crumbled goat cheese, candied pecans and balsamic vinaigrette.

dishes.name: Roasted Grape Crostini
dishes.instructions: Toss grapes with olive oil and rosemary; roast until burst and caramelized. Spread goat cheese on toasted baguette slices and top with roasted grapes.

dishes.name: Grape Walnut Salad
dishes.instructions: Halve grapes and toast the walnuts. Toss with mixed greens, crumble feta over the salad and drizzle with balsamic vinaigrette.

dishes.name: Braised Collard Greens
dishes.instructions: Cook chopped bacon until crisp, then sauté onions and collard greens in the drippings. Add apple cider vinegar and simmer until tender.

dishes.name: Collard Green Wraps
dishes.instructions: Blanch collard leaves to soften. Fill with cooked quinoa, black beans, sliced avocado and salsa, then roll up.

dishes.name: Sweet Potato Pie
dishes.instructions: Combine mashed sweet potatoes with sugar, eggs and evaporated milk. Pour into pie crust and bake until set.

dishes.name: Roasted Sweet Potato Wedges
dishes.instructions: Cut sweet potatoes into wedges, toss with olive oil, paprika and salt, and roast until crispy on the edges.

dishes.name: Roasted Okra
dishes.instructions: Toss the okra with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Roast until tender.

dishes.name: Okra Salad
dishes.instructions: Combine sliced okra with mixed greens. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.

dishes.name: Garlic Green Beans
dishes.instructions: Sauté trimmed green beans in olive oil with minced garlic until tender-crisp. Season with salt.

dishes.name: Green Bean Casserole
dishes.instructions: Combine blanched green beans with mushroom soup and milk, top with crispy fried onions and bake until bubbly.

dishes.name: Caprese Salad
dishes.instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Arrange with basil leaves, drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.

dishes.name: Heirloom Tomato Tart
dishes.instructions: Spread goat cheese on a sheet of puff pastry, top with sliced tomatoes and thyme, drizzle with olive oil, and bake until the pastry is golden.

dishes.name: Orange Glazed Chicken
dishes.instructions: Combine orange juice, soy sauce, honey and minced garlic in a saucepan and simmer until slightly thickened. Sear the chicken breasts in a skillet, then brush with the glaze and bake until cooked through.

dishes.name: Orange Almond Cake
dishes.instructions: Simmer whole oranges until soft, then purée. Mix with almond flour, eggs, sugar and melted butter to make a batter. Bake until golden and set.

dishes.name: Peach Cobbler
dishes.instructions: Arrange sliced peaches in a baking dish. Combine sugar, flour and baking powder, mix with melted butter to form a batter. Spoon over peaches and bake until golden brown.

dishes.name: Grilled Peach Salad
dishes.instructions: Halve peaches and grill until marks appear. Toss arugula with goat cheese and toasted pecans; top with warm grilled peaches and drizzle with honey.

dishes.name: Heirloom Tomato Tart
dishes.instructions: Spread goat cheese on a sheet of puff pastry, top with sliced tomatoes and thyme, drizzle with olive oil, and bake until the pastry is golden.

dishes.name: Blueberry Pancakes
dishes.instructions: Fold fresh blueberries into pancake batter made from flour, milk, eggs and baking powder. Cook on a griddle until golden.

dishes.name: Blueberry Crisp
dishes.instructions: Top a pan of blueberries with a mixture of oats, brown sugar, butter and flour. Bake until bubbly and golden on top.

dishes.name: Cranberry Sauce
dishes.instructions: Simmer cranberries with sugar and orange juice until they burst and the sauce thickens.

dishes.name: Cranberry Oat Bars
dishes.instructions: Layer cranberry jam between an oat crust and crumb topping. Bake until golden brown.

dishes.name: Raspberry Jam
dishes.instructions: Cook raspberries with sugar and lemon juice until thickened. Cool and store in jars.

dishes.name: Raspberry Lemonade
dishes.instructions: Blend raspberries with lemon juice and sugar. Mix with cold water and serve over ice.

dishes.name: Salmonberry Sorbet
dishes.instructions: Purée salmonberries with sugar and lemon juice. Freeze in an ice cream maker until set.

dishes.name: Salmonberry Jam
dishes.instructions: Cook salmonberries with sugar until thickened to make a jam. Store in sterilized jars.

dishes.name: Cloudberry Jam
dishes.instructions: Cook cloudberries with sugar and a splash of lemon juice until jammy. Let cool and store in jars.

dishes.name: Cloudberry Cheesecake
dishes.instructions: Make a basic cheesecake filling with cream cheese and sugar. Pour into crust and top with a cloudberry compote.

dishes.name: Kale Caesar Salad
dishes.instructions: Massage kale leaves with caesar dressing, then toss with croutons and grated parmesan cheese.

dishes.name: Crispy Kale Chips
dishes.instructions: Toss kale leaves with olive oil and sea salt, spread on a baking sheet and bake until crisp.

dishes.name: Carrot Ginger Soup
dishes.instructions: Sauté chopped carrots, ginger and onion until soft. Add vegetable broth and simmer until carrots are tender, then purée until smooth.

dishes.name: Honey Glazed Carrots
dishes.instructions: Cook sliced carrots in butter until tender, then drizzle with honey and season with salt.

dishes.name: Roasted Potato
dishes.instructions: Toss the potato with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Roast until tender.

dishes.name: Potato Salad
dishes.instructions: Combine sliced potato with mixed greens. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.

dishes.name: Cabbage Slaw
dishes.instructions: Toss shredded cabbage and carrots with mayonnaise and vinegar to taste. Chill before serving.

dishes.name: Stuffed Cabbage Rolls
dishes.instructions: Blanch cabbage leaves until pliable. Fill with a mixture of ground beef and cooked rice, roll up and bake in tomato sauce.

dishes.name: Roasted Turnips
dishes.instructions: Cut turnips into cubes, toss with olive oil, thyme and salt. Roast until tender and caramelized.

dishes.name: Turnip Greens Sauté
dishes.instructions: Sauté chopped turnip greens in olive oil with garlic and a pinch of red pepper flakes until wilted.

dishes.name: Roasted Pineapple
dishes.instructions: Toss the pineapple with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Roast until tender.

dishes.name: Pineapple Salad
dishes.instructions: Combine sliced pineapple with mixed greens. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.

dishes.name: Mango Lassi
dishes.instructions: Blend mango flesh with yogurt, milk and a pinch of cardamom until frothy.

dishes.name: Mango Salsa
dishes.instructions: Dice mango and vegetables, mix with chopped cilantro and lime juice for a fresh salsa.

dishes.name: Papaya Boat
dishes.instructions: Halve a papaya and scoop out the seeds. Fill with yogurt, sprinkle granola on top and drizzle with honey.

dishes.name: Papaya Smoothie
dishes.instructions: Blend papaya with orange juice, banana and a squeeze of lime for a tropical smoothie.

dishes.name: Banana Bread
dishes.instructions: Mash bananas and mix with flour, sugar, eggs and melted butter. Bake until a toothpick inserted into the loaf comes out clean.

dishes.name: Banana Smoothie
dishes.instructions: Blend bananas with yogurt, milk and a drizzle of honey until smooth.

dishes.name: Roasted Passion Fruit
dishes.instructions: Toss the passion fruit with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Roast until tender.

dishes.name: Passion Fruit Salad
dishes.instructions: Combine sliced passion fruit with mixed greens. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.

dishes.name: Taro Bubble Tea
dishes.instructions: Cook taro root until tender and blend with milk and sugar. Serve over cooked tapioca pearls with ice.

dishes.name: Steamed Taro Cakes
dishes.instructions: Mix grated taro with rice flour and seasonings, steam until set and cut into squares. Pan‑fry until crisp on the outside.

dishes.name: Sweet Potato Pie
dishes.instructions: Combine mashed sweet potatoes with sugar, eggs and evaporated milk. Pour into pie crust and bake until set.

dishes.name: Roasted Sweet Potato Wedges
dishes.instructions: Cut sweet potatoes into wedges, toss with olive oil, paprika and salt, and roast until crispy on the edges.

dishes.name: Candied Yams
dishes.instructions: Slice yams and bake with brown sugar, melted butter and cinnamon until tender and caramelized.

dishes.name: Yam Fries
dishes.instructions: Cut yams into thin strips, toss with olive oil, salt and pepper, and bake until crispy.

dishes.name: Kale Caesar Salad
dishes.instructions: Massage kale leaves with caesar dressing, then toss with croutons and grated parmesan cheese.

dishes.name: Crispy Kale Chips
dishes.instructions: Toss kale leaves with olive oil and sea salt, spread on a baking sheet and bake until crisp.

dishes.name: Spinach Feta Pie
dishes.instructions: Sauté spinach and onion. Layer phyllo dough in a pan, fill with spinach and feta mixture mixed with beaten eggs, and bake until golden.

dishes.name: Green Smoothie
dishes.instructions: Blend spinach with banana, apple and almond milk until smooth for a nutritious smoothie.

dishes.name: Roasted Apple
